en.desc_tex_loading_mode: Texture loading mode when apply preset
en.desc_tex_mode_keyword: Using keywords to match texture in an user selected folder
en.desc_tex_mode_auto: Try to open textures with the order: Similar Name > Fixed Path > Stay Empty
en.desc_tex_mode_stay_empty: Don't load texture for this texture node
en.desc_tex_mode_fixed_path: Try to open this texture with it's current path, will keep empty if failed to find
en.desc_tex_mode_similar_name: Compare the texture names and open the best mattched one from selected texture folder, will keep empty when failed to match
en.desc_tex_default_mode: Default texture saving mode when save the preset
en.desc_extra_confirmation: Popup a confirmation window when save & delete preset or packs
en.desc_in_one_menu: Put packs into one menu rather than listing all of them in the node add menu
en.desc_overwrite_tree_io: Overwrite node tree interface (IO sockets, panels) if the existing one is not capatibale with the one in preset. Note: If open, your original node tree interface will be changed and the links to them will be disappeared
en.desc_texture_directory: Searching textures in this directory when apply preset
en.desc_compare_tolerance: The tolerance of the texture name comparation, higher means that more dissimilar textures can pass the comparation rather than stay empty. Default 0.50 as a moderate tolerance
en.desc_tex_key: When open texture, try to find best matched tex with keys. Use "/" to separate multiple keys
en.desc_fast_create_preset_name: Create preset with current selected nodes by this name
en.desc_refresh: Refresh presets and packs, useful for cross-file sync
en.desc_export_all_packs: Export all hot node preset packs with .zip suffix
en.desc_export_pack: Export hot node preset pack with .zip suffix
en.desc_import_pack: Import hot node preset pack(s) with .zip suffix
en.desc_save_texture: Save rules of auto searching texture when apply preset. Note that you should do a save preset action and keep the last saved preset selected to save texture rules
en.desc_create_pack: Create a new pack to store presets
en.desc_delete_pack: Delete selected pack and all the node presets in it
en.desc_select_pack: Select a pack to access the presets in it
en.desc_add_nodes: Add nodes to the editor tree
en.desc_create_preset: Create a new node preset with selected nodes
en.desc_save_preset: Save selected nodes to the current selected preset
en.desc_delete_preset: Move the active preset up/down in the list
en.desc_clear_presets: Delete all presets in the current selected pack
en.desc_move_preset: Move the active preset up/down in the list
en.rpt_preset_clear_success: All presets in pack "{pack_name}" were deleted
en.rpt_nodes_add_fail_tree: Cannot apply preset: It is a {tree_type} but current edit tree is a {edit_tree_type}
en.rpt_nodes_add_fail_tex: Nodes added. But {failed_tex_num} textures can't be found. Check if your path exist, and has images that match at least one keyword
en.rpt_tex_save_fail_exceed: Too many nodes were selected! You can only save one texture rule at a time
en.rpt_tex_save_fail_no_node: No node selected! You need to select at least one node to save a texture rule
en.rpt_tex_save_fail_not_tex_node: You are saving a node that don't need textures! Only node that needs a texture file can be saved
en.rpt_tex_save_fail_not_saved_node: This node is not in the last saved preset
en.rpt_tex_save_fail_not_preset_selected: Current selected preset is not the last saved one
en.rpt_pack_import_fail_empty_name: "{file_name}" failed to import: Pack name cannot be empty
en.rpt_pack_import_fail_not_auto: "{file_name}" failed to import: The file seems not a autosaved hot node pack
en.rpt_pack_import_fail_existed: "{file_name}" failed to import: Pack "{pack_name}" already existed
en.rpt_pack_import_fail_meta_lack: "{file_name}" failed to import: The file seems not a hot node pack
en.rpt_pack_import_fail_meta_invalid: "{file_name}" failed to import: The pack's meta data is corrupted
en.rpt_pack_import_fail_oversize: "{file_name}" failed to import: Cannot import pack that is bigger than 150 MiB
en.rpt_pack_import_partly_success: Imported {success_num} packs of all {file_num} packs. The others were failed to import, see the previous error infos
en.rpt_pack_import_fail_all: Failed to import: See the previous error infos
en.rpt_pack_export_fail_empty_name: Failed to export: Pack name cannot be empty

zh.desc_tex_loading_mode: 应用预设时的贴图加载模式
zh.desc_tex_mode_keyword: 查找匹配关键词的贴图
zh.desc_tex_mode_auto: 分别尝试按以下模式打开贴图: 相似名称 > 固定路径 > 保持为空
zh.desc_tex_mode_stay_empty: 不加载此纹理节点的纹理
zh.desc_tex_mode_fixed_path: 尝试使用当前路径打开此纹理，如果找不到则保持为空
zh.desc_tex_mode_similar_name: 根据当前贴图的名称, 在选定的文件夹中查找拥有最相似名称的贴图
zh.desc_tex_default_mode: 保存预设时的默认贴图保存模式
zh.desc_extra_confirmation: 保存和删除预设或预设包时弹出确认窗口
zh.desc_in_one_menu: 将预设包收纳进一个菜单中, 而不是在节点添加菜单中列出所有预设包
zh.desc_overwrite_tree_io: 如果现有的节点树接口 (IO插槽, 面板) 与预设中的接口不兼容, 则按预设的接口做修改. 注意: 如果打开, 原始节点树接口将被更改, 相关连线将消失
zh.desc_texture_directory: 应用预设时, 将在此文件夹中查找并加载贴图
zh.desc_compare_tolerance: 加载贴图时, 匹配贴图名称的最高容差. 容差越高, 则越多不相似的名称会被纳入考虑. 默认值为适中的 0.50
zh.desc_tex_key: 打开贴图时，尝试使用键找到最匹配的纹理。使用 “/” 分隔多个键
zh.desc_fast_create_preset_name: 使用当前选定的节点创建预设的名称
zh.desc_selected_pack: 当前选择的节点预设包
zh.desc_export_all_packs: 将所有节点预设包导出为.zip后缀
zh.desc_export_pack: 将节点预设包导出为.zip文件
zh.desc_import_pack: 导入.zip格式的节点预设包
zh.desc_save_texture: 应用预设时, 将按设置加载贴图. 请确保当前选择的贴图节点包含在上一次保存的预设中
zh.desc_create_pack: 创建一个新的预设包, 用于存储预设
zh.desc_delete_pack: 删除选定的预设包及其中的所有节点预设
zh.desc_select_pack: 选择一个预设包以访问其中的预设
zh.desc_add_nodes: 向当前面板添加预设中的节点
zh.desc_create_preset: 使用选定的节点创建新的节点预设
zh.desc_save_preset: 将选定的节点保存到当前选定的预设中
zh.desc_clear_presets: 删除当前选定预设包中的所有预设
zh.desc_move_preset: 在列表中上下移动预设
zh.gui_info_undo_redo_skip_reason: 数据被另一个文件更新
zh.rpt_preset_clear_success: 已删除预设包 "{pack_name}" 中的所有预设
zh.rpt_nodes_add_fail_tree: 无法应用预设: 它是 {tree_type}，但当前编辑树是 {edit_tree_type}
zh.rpt_nodes_add_fail_tex: 节点已添加。但找不到 {failed_tex_num} 个贴图。请检查路径是否存在，并且至少有一个关键词匹配的图像
zh.rpt_tex_save_fail_exceed: 选择的节点过多！一次只能保存一个纹理规则
zh.rpt_tex_save_fail_no_node: 未选择节点！您需要至少选择一个节点来保存纹理规则
zh.rpt_tex_save_fail_not_tex_node: 保存贴图设置失败: 这个节点不需要加载纹理贴图
zh.rpt_tex_save_fail_not_saved_node: 此节点不在上次保存的预设中
zh.rpt_tex_save_fail_not_preset_selected: 当前选定的预设不是上次保存的预设
zh.rpt_pack_import_fail_empty_name: 导入失败: 预设包名称不能为空
zh.rpt_pack_import_fail_not_auto: 导入失败: 该文件似乎不是自动保存的热节点预设包
zh.rpt_pack_import_fail_existed: 导入失败: 预设包 "{pack_name}" 已存在
zh.rpt_pack_import_fail_meta_lack: 导入失败: 该文件似乎不是 Hot Node 预设包
zh.rpt_pack_import_fail_meta_invalid: 导入失败: 预设包的元数据损坏
zh.rpt_pack_import_fail_oversize: 导入失败: 无法导入大于 150 MiB 的预设包
zh.rpt_pack_import_success_import_mul: 成功导入 {success_num} 个预设包
zh.rpt_pack_import_partly_success: 导入部分成功: 在 {file_num} 个选择的预设包中, 导入了 {success_num} 个预设包. 其他预设包导入失败, 请参阅前面的错误信息
zh.rpt_pack_import_fail_all: 导入失败: 请参阅前面的错误信息
zh.rpt_pack_export_fail_empty_name: 导出失败: 预设包名称不能为空
zh.rpt_pack_export_success: 成功将预设包 "{pack_name}" 导出到 {to_file_path}
zh.rpt_pack_export_all_success: 成功将所有预设包导出到 {dir_path}
